description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Beat enemies with Shuriken and Katana, Get back the book of secrets stolen from castle! Buy equipments or get higher levels to power-up. You can play games at the Gambling Hall or rebattle with bosses at the Arena in the latter part of the game.
description.short: Beat enemies with Shuriken and Katana, Get back the book of secrets stolen from castle! Buy equipments or get higher levels to power-up. You can play games at the Gambling Hall or rebattle with bosses at the Arena in the latter part of the game.
